desc: The UrineAide® is a patent pending, first of its kind, Home Bathroom Urinal. Designed to eliminate pee splashing onto the floor or walls of your bathroom, eliminates urine drips on the toilet seat, and guarantees that you will never miss the toilet. Pee Splash, Waterless Urinal, Home Bathroom Urinal, Urinal, Pee Splash

layout.text: ELIMINATE THE SPREAD OF GERMS IN YOUR BATHROOM
